amendatorysection.para: Sections 20-301 to 20-344 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Fair Housing Act.

annotation.para: The plaintiff failed to prove her request to secure her daughter's emotional support dogs through construction of a fence in a common area was a reasonable accommodation under the Nebraska Fair Housing Act, where the evidence showed that without the fence, the daughter freely used and enjoyed the animals at the condominium. Guenther v. Walnut Grove Hillside Condo. Regime No. 3, 309 Neb. 655, 961 N.W.2d 825 (2021).
